description:
Discover the new features Flash Professional CS6 offers animators and
application developers. Author Anastasia McCune walks through each of the
software's key enhancements, including the generation of sprite sheets, which
can accommodate multiple symbols or bitmaps; a new extension allowing Flash
animations to be exported to HTML5; and the captive run time, which allows
developers to bundle the AIR framework into an AIR application, creating a
self-contained entity which eliminates the third-party dependency.
title: Flash Professional CS6 New Features
